definition: something to which a mountain climber's rope can be secured, to fasten a boat to a bitt, pin, or cleat
details:
noun
- something to which a mountain climber's rope can be secured
verb
- to fasten a boat to a bitt, pin, or cleat
= example: to fasten a boat to a bitt, pin, or cleat
- to turn a rope round an object or person in order to secure it or him
= example: to turn a rope round an object or person in order to secure it or him
